component.name: memento
component.summary: An mpv-based video player for studying Japanese

description.p: Memento is a free and open source, mpv-based video player that makes studying Japanese easier with a built in popup dictionary, Anki integration, and more.

ul.li: Memento uses Yomichan's dictionary format and supports all the same dictionaries
Automates Anki card creation through AnkiConnect
Grammar aware search matches terms in subtitles regardless of most inflections
Supports mpv plugins, upscalers, and shaders
Supports mpv configuration files such as input.conf for rebinding keys and mpv.conf for configuring mpv
Supports streaming from many websites through youtube-dl
